overview: When Wal, Junior and Meg, get selected to go France to study at La Sorbonne in Paris, they leave behind the suburbs where they used to live in Belem, Brazil, to go to the big city. But that is not it. The trio is also exploring themselves and trying to find their own personas in the LGBT Community. The love between the three of them is what it keeps them going forward.
title: Tant Pis: Chapter One
